content.text:
# Kingoriidae

| image = KingoriaDB.jpg
| image_caption = Restoration of Dicynodontoides recurvidens
| taxon = Kingoriidae
| authority = King, 1988
| subdivision =
* Dicynodontoides
* Kombuisia
* Niassodon
* Thliptosaurus
}}
Kingoriidae is an extinct family of dicynodont therapsids. It includes the Late Permian Niassodon, Thliptosaurus, Dicynodontoides (initially called Kingoria) and the Triassic Kombuisia.
References
